text: Atilio Cremaschi Oyarzún (March 8, 1923 in Punta Arenas – September 3, 2007 in Santiago) was a Chilean footballer who played for Unión Española, Colo-Colo and Rangers of Chile and in the Chile national football team in the 1950 FIFA World Cup in Brazil. ==Titles== * Unión Española 1943 and 1951 (Chilean Championship) * Colo-Colo 1953 and 1956 (Chilean Championship) ==External links== * Profile at Colo Colo.cl Profile at Category:1923 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chile international footballers Category:Colo-Colo footballers Category:Unión Española footballers Category:Rangers de Talca footballers Category:1950 FIFA World Cup players Category:Association football forwards
title: Atilio Cremaschi
